Package it.polimi.ingsw.resources

Class ChoiceSet

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.resources.ChoiceSet
public class ChoiceSet
extends java.lang.Object
ChoiceSet represents a set of resources to choose from

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ChoiceSet()
    The default constructor initializes set to an empty set
    ChoiceSet​(boolean fullSet)
    This constructor allows to build a ChoiceSet that contains all possible ConcreteResources

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addChoice​(ConcreteResource resource)
    addChoice inserts a new resource into the set
    boolean containsResource​(ConcreteResource resource)
    containsResource checks whether a given resource is in the set
    boolean empty()
    empty() checks whether the set is empty
    int size()
    size() returns the number of ConcreteResources contained in the set

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ChoiceSet

      public ChoiceSet()
      The default constructor initializes set to an empty set

    • ChoiceSet

      public ChoiceSet​(boolean fullSet)
      This constructor allows to build a ChoiceSet that contains all possible ConcreteResources
      Parameters:
      fullSet - If True than set is initialized to contain all possible ConcreteResources

  • Method Details

    • addChoice

      public void addChoice​(ConcreteResource resource)
      addChoice inserts a new resource into the set
      Parameters:
      resource - The ConcreteResource to add

    • containsResource

      public boolean containsResource​(ConcreteResource resource)
      containsResource checks whether a given resource is in the set
      Parameters:
      resource - The ConcreteResource to check
      Returns:
      True iff resource is contained in the set

    • empty

      public boolean empty()
      empty() checks whether the set is empty
      Returns:
      True iff the set is empty

    • size

      public int size()
      size() returns the number of ConcreteResources contained in the set
      Returns:
      The size of the set
